about.title: About The Platform
about.description: Our mission is to provide transparent, accessible information about the Iraqi parliamentary elections to empower voters and foster democracy.
about.missionText: We strive to deliver a neutral, user-friendly platform that helps Iraqi citizens understand the political landscape, evaluate candidates, and participate confidently in the electoral process.
about.feature1: A comprehensive database of candidates with advanced search filters.
about.feature2: Detailed candidate profiles including party affiliation, governorate, and ballot number.
about.feature3: An interactive statistics dashboard with data visualizations.
about.feature4: Bilingual support (Arabic and English) with full RTL design.
about.commitmentText: We are committed to presenting accurate, up-to-date information sourced from the Independent High Electoral Commission (IHEC). Our platform is non-partisan and dedicated solely to informing the electorate.
